channel.title: Exception error
channel.description:
[code]
Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at Model.method479(Model.java:1044) at ItemDef.method201(ItemDef.java:641) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:530) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8312) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1900) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8107) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8855) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4674) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
-Added the dat file -Added itemdef.java -Added new model header -Increased item limit in config.java -Original PI Base with a renamed client
What is the problem?
What I have tried
-I made a new item.cfg for it -I have replaced an item.cfg number for it( combined with model number in itemdef.java)
So not sure...

item.title: Exception error
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“GerraOnline, post:2, topic:394624”]We’re you trying to add K4rn4ge 634 items?[/quote]No I was adding torva to a soulsplit client. I think I will be moving to the mtb client though as i am majorly annoyed at it.
